snippet.title: Nova Hearts - Official Trailer | Women-Led Games x TGA 2024
snippet.description: A mysterious force of power transforms you and other highly attractive people in your area into superheroes and villains! TEXT, DATE and FIGHT your friends and enemies alike. Meet the characters of Nova Hearts and get another look at gameplay in this trailer for the upcoming strategy dating sim visual novel game. Nova Hearts will be available on PC.
